name: Project Argus
overview: In the 22nd Century, the Kansler and his spacefleet is about to take over the solar system. An average Joe is captured and remade into the powerful cyborg Argus, to fight the interplanetary war for the Kansler... until he rebels against his masters. Argus and his female counterpart Venix must fight their way across the solar system to win freedom, and end the Kansler's power grab...
